answers.answer: Any conic disease will effect your marriage.Diabetes requires a change in eatingIF you do not control your BG you can have ED problemsUncontrolled BG can lead to a lot of marital stress.Diabetes is controllable.

Diabetes is a treatable disease.  I have been diabetic for almost 2 years.  I don't know if you're male or female but as long as you eat properly and exercise as your doctor suggests, you can have a normal and active married life.  Paramount to maintaining health is keeping the weight down and exercising.Good luck and have a great life.

question: Am getting married now at 30 am diagnosed with diabetes type-2 does it effect my married life
title: at 30 am diagnosed with diabetes type-2 does it effect my married life
